kinetic.simulator

Class SimulatorConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Dictionary<K,V>

          • kinetic.simulator.SimulatorConfiguration
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.util.Map<java.lang.Object,java.lang.Object>

    public class SimulatorConfiguration
extends java.util.Properties
    Simulator configuration instance.

      • KINETIC_HOME

        public static final java.lang.String KINETIC_HOME
        Property name to set kinetic home folder directory under KINETIC_HOME

        The default is set to USER_HOME/kinetic directory if not set.

        For example, /user/yourName/kinetic.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • PERSIST_HOME

        public static final java.lang.String PERSIST_HOME
        Property name to set persist home folder directory under the KINETIC_HOME folder. The default is set to leveldb.ldb under kinetic home folder. For example:

        /user/yourName/kinetic/leveldb/leveldb.ldb

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

        public static final java.lang.String SIMULATOR_VERSION
        current simulator version.

      • getSslPort

        public int getSslPort()
        Get SSL service port.
        Returns:
        ssl service port.

      • setStartSsl

        public void setStartSsl(boolean flag)
        Set start SSL/TLS service flag.

        By default, the simulator is started with TCP (8123) and SSL (8443) services.

        If the parameter is set to true, application may also use setSslPort(int) to set SSL service port such that it is different from the default SSL/TLS service port (8443).

        Applications may define Java System Property "-Dkinetic.io.ssl=true" to use SSL/TLS as the only (default) transport service. Applications should avoid calling this method with parameter (flag) set to true when "-Dkinetic.io.ssl=true" is already defined.

        Parameters:
        flag - Set to false to disable SSL service. Default is set to true.
        See Also:
        getUseSslAsDefault(), setSslPort(int)

      • getStartSsl

        public boolean getStartSsl()
        Get start SSL service flag.
        Returns:
        true if start SSL flag is set to true. Otherwise, return false.

      • setUseNio

        public void setUseNio(boolean flag)
        Set use Java NIO or not.
        Parameters:
        flag - set to true if use nio. Otherwise, set to false. The default is set to true if not set.

      • getUseNio

        public boolean getUseNio()
        Get if the server uses Java NIO.
        Returns:
        true if the server uses Java NIO. Otherwise, return false.

      • getUseSslAsDefault

        public boolean getUseSslAsDefault()
        Applications may define Java System Property "-Dkinetic.io.ssl=true" and uses SSL/TLS as the default transport service.

        Returns:
        true if SSL/TLS is used as the default transport service. Otherwise, return false.

      • getThreadPoolAwaitTimeout

        public long getThreadPoolAwaitTimeout()
        Get Java Nio thread pool exit await timeout - used when connection is closed and Java client runtime library waiting for thread pool to exit.
        Returns:
        time out in milli seconds.

      • setThreadPoolAwaitTimeOut

        public void setThreadPoolAwaitTimeOut(long millis)
        Set Java Nio thread pool exit await timeout - used when connection is closed and Java client runtime library waiting for thread pool to exit.
        Parameters:
        millis - Java Nio thread pool exit await timeout in milli seconds

      • getProperty

        public java.lang.String getProperty(java.lang.String name)
        Get configuration property with the specified property name.

        If there is a value set to the configuration, the value is returned. If there is no value set to the configuration, the Simulator checks and returns the value if Java System Property is defined for the property name.

        Overrides:
        getProperty in class java.util.Properties

      • setNioServiceBossThreads

        public void setNioServiceBossThreads(int nThreads)
        Set nio service thread pool number for the simulator nio 'boss' (in-bound connection) thread pool.

        If not set, the default is set to 0 - the system will determine the number based on available processors obtained from Runtime API.

        Parameters:
        nThreads - number of threads for simulator nio in-bound connection thread pool.
        See Also:
        Runtime.availableProcessors()

      • getNioServiceBossThreads

        public int getNioServiceBossThreads()
        Get nio thread number for the simulator nio service thread pool.
        Returns:
        nio threads number for the simulator nio service thread pool.

      • setNioServiceWorkerThreads

        public void setNioServiceWorkerThreads(int nThreads)
        Set nio service thread pool number for the simulator nio 'worker' thread pool.

        If not set, the default is set to 0 - the system will determine the number based on available processors obtained from Runtime API.

        Parameters:
        nThreads - number of threads for simulator nio worker thread pool.
        See Also:
        Runtime.availableProcessors()

      • getNioServiceWorkerThreads

        public int getNioServiceWorkerThreads()
        Get nio thread number for the simulator nio service worker thread pool.
        Returns:
        nio threads number for the simulator nio service worker thread pool.

      • setUseMemoryStore

        public void setUseMemoryStore(boolean useMemoryStore)
        Set to true to instruct the simulator to use memory store.

        The default is set to false. LevelDB is used by default.

        Parameters:
        useMemoryStore - set to true to instruct the simulator to use memory store.

      • getUseMemoryStore

        public boolean getUseMemoryStore()
        Get if memory store is (will be used) used by the simulator.
        Returns:
        true to use memory store. Otherwise, LevelDB is used.

      • setTickTime

        public void setTickTime(long tickTime)
        Set heart beat tick time for the simulator (in milli-seconds).

        Default is set to 30000 milli-seconds.

        Parameters:
        tickTime - heartbeat for the simulator.

      • getTickTime

        public long getTickTime()
        Get heart beat tick time (in milli-seconds) for the simulator.

        Default is set to 5000 milli-seconds.

        Returns:
        heart beat tick time for the simulator.

      • setHeartbeatAddress

        public void setHeartbeatAddress(java.lang.String multicastAddress)
        Set heart beat address for the simulator. The heart beat will be sent to the specified multicast address and port.
        Parameters:
        multicastAddress - heart beat address for the simulator.
        See Also:
        setHeartBeatPort(int)

      • getHeartbeatAddress

        public java.lang.String getHeartbeatAddress()
        Get heart beat address for the simulator. The heart beat will be sent to the specified multicast address and port.
        Returns:
        heart beat address for the simulator.
        See Also:
        setHeartBeatPort(int)

      • setHeartBeatPort

        public void setHeartBeatPort(int multicastPort)
        Set heart beat destination port number. The heart beat will be sent to the specified multicast address and port.
        Parameters:
        multicastPort - heart beat destination port number.
        See Also:
        setHeartbeatAddress(String)

      • getHeartbeatPort

        Get heart beat destination port number. The heart beat will be sent to the specified multicast address and port.
        Returns:
        heart beat destination port number
        See Also:
        getHeartbeatAddress()

      • setNioResourceSharing

        public static void setNioResourceSharing(boolean flag)
        Set nio resource sharing flag. Set this flag to true to start a large number of simulators (such as thousands) within the same JVM, depending on the runtime operation system configuration.
        Parameters:
        flag - if set to true, nio resources will be shared within the same JVM for the simulator.

      • getNioResourceSharing

        public static boolean getNioResourceSharing()
        Get nio resource sharing flag. If set to true, applications may be able to start a large number of simulators (such as thousands) within the same JVM, depending on the runtime operation system configuration.
        Returns:
        true if the simulators share nio resources. Otherwise return false.

      • getMessageOrderingEnforced

        public boolean getMessageOrderingEnforced()
        Get if message is processed in received order within the same connection.
        Returns:
        true if message ordering is enforced. Otherwise, return false.

      • setMessageOrderingEnforced

        public void setMessageOrderingEnforced(boolean flag)
        Set if message ordering should be enforced for the simulator.

        This flag must be set before starting/instantiating the simulator.

        Parameters:
        flag - set to true to instruct the simulator to enforce message ordering within the same connection (a kinetic client instance)

      • getMaxSupportedValueSize

        public static int getMaxSupportedValueSize()
        Max supported value size in bytes. Default is set to 1M bytes (1024 * 1024).
        Returns:
        max supported value size for the simulator.

      • getMaxConnections

        public static int getMaxConnections()
        Get max supported concurrent connections. There is no enforcement for the simulator at this time. Returns -1 means no limit is enforced for the current implementation. The number will be adjusted when the limit is enforced.
        Returns:
        default value (-1)

      • getMaxMessageSize

        public static int getMaxMessageSize()
        Get max supported message size. There is no enforcement for the simulator at this time. Returns -1 means no limit is enforced for the current implementation. The number will be adjusted when the limit is enforced.
        Returns:
        default value (-1)

      • getMaxOutstandingReadRequests

        public static int getMaxOutstandingReadRequests()
        Get max outstanding read requests. There is no enforcement for the simulator at this time. Returns -1 means no limit is enforced for the current implementation. The number will be adjusted when the limit is enforced.
        Returns:
        default value (-1)

      • getMaxOutstandingWriteRequests

        public static int getMaxOutstandingWriteRequests()
        Get max outstanding write requests. There is no enforcement for the simulator at this time. Returns -1 means no limit is enforced for the current implementation. The number will be adjusted when the limit is enforced.
        Returns:
        default value (-1)

      • getMaxSupportedTagSize

        public static int getMaxSupportedTagSize()
        Get max supported tag size. There is no enforcement for the simulator at this time. Returns -1 means no limit is enforced for the current implementation. The number will be adjusted when the limit is enforced.
        Returns:
        default value (-1)

      • getMaxIdentityCount

        public static int getMaxIdentityCount()
        Get maximum identity count. Returns -1 means not enforced by the current implementation.
        Returns:
        default value (-1)

      • getSimulatorVersion

        public static java.lang.String getSimulatorVersion()
        Get the current simulator version.
        Returns:
        current simulator version.

        public static java.lang.String getProtocolVersion()

        kinetic-protocol

        Returns:
        Kinetic protocol version supported by the current API implementation.
        See Also:

      • getHeartbeatProvider

        public com.seagate.kinetic.simulator.heartbeat.HeartbeatProvider getHeartbeatProvider()
        Get heartbeat provider for the simulator instance. The MulticastHeartbeatProvider is used if not set.
        Returns:
        the heartbeat provider for the simulator instance

      • getSimulatorHome

        public java.lang.String getSimulatorHome()
        Get simulator home folder name.
        Returns:
        simulator home folder name

      • getSerialNumber

        public java.lang.String getSerialNumber()
        Get the serial number of the running instance of simulator.

        This number is to simulator a drive's serial number. The number is obtained from the hash code of the following string:

        ip + "kinetic home" + "persist home"

        Returns:
        the serial number of the running instance of simulator

      • getWorldWideName

        public java.lang.String getWorldWideName()
        Get world wide name of the running instance of the simulator.

        The string is a hex of md5 obtained from the following components:

        ip + "kinetic home" + "persist home"

        Applications should handle MD5 collision for the name as desired if necessary.

        Returns:
        world wide name of the running instance of the simulato

      • getMaxCommandsPerBatch

        public int getMaxCommandsPerBatch()
        Get maximum number of commands per batch request.
        Returns:
        maximum number of commands per batch request.

      • getMaxOutstandingBatches

        public int getMaxOutstandingBatches()
        Get maximum number of outstanding batch requests per device.
        Returns:
        maximum number of outstanding batch requests per device.
